articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Mushroom Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Mushroom Farm
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the Mushroom Farm built by Farm No. 1116 under KPA Unit 534.
					 Being briefed on the farm before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he acquainted himself in detail with its construction and production.
					
					 The mushroom cultivation grounds look very nice and I am pleased to see them, he said, highly praising the unit for having built a modern mushroom farm with a large capacity and boosted the production.
					
					 He praised the unit for having built the indoor cultivation grounds by a dry method of construction through the introduction of latest technology for making the mushroom production intensive while using a minimum area for production in a matter of a few months, in particular.
					
					 He asked about the quantity of mushroom produced in the newly-built indoor cultivation grounds in a year. He said he was pleased among other things that the farm is capable of reaping a high and secure harvest of mushroom even in a small area by producing mushroom all the year round unlike arch-style mushroom cultivation grounds.
					
					 At the general control room, he was pleased to learn that the farm has automated a monitoring and control system whereby the growth of mushrooms at every cultivation ground is monitored and production is commanded in real time.
					
					 Going round a fungus cultivation ground, he said that it is important to produce fungus in mushroom cultivation, adding that production can be increased when fungi are cultivated by an industrial method.
					
					 He said that it is good for the farm to produce mushroom at both arch-style mushroom grounds and the indoor cultivation grounds built by a dry method of construction, instructing the army and society to build mushroom farms in a big way by following the example set by this farm.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to thoroughly implement the behest of President Kim Il Sung who called for turning the country into a world famous mushroom producer by building such mushroom farms in different parts of the country.
					
					 Underlining the need to provide a standard design in order to build modern mushroom farms and scrupulously organize a work for introducing mushroom cultivation technique and experience, he took measures for doing so with his loving care.
					
					 He had a photo session with the employees of the mushroom farm.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Jon Chang Bok, Han Kwang Sang, Kim Kyong Ok, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Third Round of Working Talks between Authorities of North and South of Korea Held
articles.content:
Third Round of Working Talks between Authorities of North and South of Korea Held
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The third round of working talks between the authorities of the north and the south of Korea were held in the Kaesong Industrial Zone Monday to normalize the operation in the zone.
					 At the talks both sides advanced draft agreements for normalizing the operation in the zone and exchanged views.
					
					 They agreed to hold the fourth round of working talks in the zone on Wednesday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Celebrating War Victory Day as Great Festival of Victors
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Celebrating War Victory Day as Great Festival of Victors
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial calls on all people to more dynamically advance to greet July 27, the day of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, demonstrating the spirit of uninterrupted innovations and progress under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 It is the unanimous desire and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to glorify the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war as a great festival of victors by performing heroic feats in the showdown with the U.S. and in building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 To grandly celebrate the 60th anniversary of the war victory is a work of weighty importance to firmly defend and preserve and fully demonstrate the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war.
					
					 The President performed undying exploits for the country and nation, the era and humankind by defeating U.S. imperialism which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and bringing about a victory in the war. The high dignity and invincible might of the DPRK shedding its rays throughout the world, the worthy life led by its people and their rosy future would have been unthinkable without his exploits. To preserve and add glory to his exploits is a noble obligation and bounden duty of the people who are living in the socialist homeland of Juche which was protected by him. 
					
					 With July 27, the day of the war victory, drawing closer, the more profound thanks are expressed to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by the service personnel and people throughout the country from the capital city Pyongyang to a far-flung island posts. And more successful arrangements are made to add shine to the exploits of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 By significantly and grandly celebrating the war victory day this year, the service personnel and people of the DPRK will instill confidence and optimism into the world people aspiring after independence and deal sledge-hammer blows at the imperialists.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK will build the most powerful nation on this land to be envied by the world as they are firmly armed with the Juche idea and applying it to practice.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article dedicated to the 27th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea".
					
					 The article notes:
					
					 The Korean people's revolutionary traits of applying the Juche idea to practice are now fully displayed in increasing in every way the might of single-minded unity around their leader in thinking and purpose and the sense of moral obligation. They also find a clear manifestation in that the people are giving full play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism with the collectivist outlook on life. They are fully demonstrated in dynamically pushing forward the advance for a great surge by their own style and efforts.
					
					 Today the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people have formed solid socio-political integrity in which they are single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. All the service personnel and people are dynamically advancing toward the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, becoming true comrades and comrades-in-arms hands in hands and shoulder to shoulder with the Marshal. This is the true picture of our society.
					
					 Whole society represents a large harmonious family in which all its members are helping and leading each other forward,  holding high the collectivist slogan "One for All and All for One!" 
					
					 It is the Korean people who conduct production and construction, develop culture their own way, not following the style of others, and live and work as required by the socialist life style.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will have neither difficulties insurmountable nor fortress unconquerable as they are dynamically advancing along the road of Juche, firmly believing in the party and the leader.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defusing Confrontation between North and South of Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defusing Confrontation between North and South of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- To defuse the confrontation between the north and the south of Korea is essential for bringing earlier the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article on Monday.
					 As long as the north and the south of Korea stand in confrontation with each other, it is hard to create an atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 There is no reason whatsoever for the north and the south to fail to defuse such confrontation.
					
					 The differing ideologies and social system that have long existed between the north and the south of Korea cannot be any ground for fostering antagonism and confrontation between compatriots.
					
					 Such confrontation will only lead to a war.
					
					 Ceaseless war drills of various missions being staged by the south Korean regime in collusion with the U.S. are criminal acts of escalating the political and military confrontation between the north and the south of Korea and disturbing peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Any military exercise is an open threat to the other party.
					
					 Exposed to such threat, peace is unthinkable and distrust will get deeper between compatriots.
					
					 The reunification of the country can be achieved only through the great national unity. Ours is the homogeneous nation with the history and culture spanning 5 000 years. Although the nation is partitioned by foreign forces, it can be reunified on the basis of its common denominator.
					
					 It is impossible to avoid confrontation and war if one side forces the other side to accept its own social system, making the differing ideologies and social systems absolute.
					
					The south Korean authorities do not take a positive approach towards dialogue and cooperation, talking about "confidence" whenever an opportunity presents itself, and is chilling the sincere efforts of the DPRK, touting "new south-north relations" and the like. 
					
					 As long as the south Korean regime persists in confrontation with compatriots, paying no heed to the voices of the nation, it is quite impossible to mend the inter-Korean ties.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out as one in the patriotic struggle to pave a wide avenue for defusing the inter-Korean confrontation and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Rejecting Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Rejecting Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of Japanese took to the streets in different cities of Japan recently, chanting slogans "Oust Koreans from Japan!" and "Koreans are not needed in Japan!"
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This reminds one of samurais who were keen on hunting Koreans at the time of the great Kanto quake.
					
					 The horrible scene now presented in Japan is a clear reminder of the Japanese reactionaries' deep-seated hostility toward Korea and national chauvinism and, at the same time, a wanton violation of international law and human rights.
					
					 During the Japanese imperialists' rule over Korea many Koreans were walked off to Japan at the point of bayonet and were subject to slave labor and hurled to dangerous battle sites. Lots of them lost their lives. Descendants of the survivors are Koreans residing in Japan now.
					
					 Japan has moral and legal responsibility and obligation to protect the life of the Koreans in Japan. The International Convention on Human Rights provides that foreigners shall be invested with all equal rights.
					
					 It is very ill-bodying development that demonstrations against Koreans in Japan were waged in Japan at a time when Japanese politicians let loose a spate of rubbish embellishing the past crimes.
					
					 In a nutshell, it shows that Japanese society has reached a very dangerous phase in lurching to the right and if conditions are provided, the Japanese reactionaries can commit unimaginable crimes against the Korean people. Herein lie the gravity and danger of Japan's ever-mounting enmity toward Korea and national chauvinism.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are trying to give vent to their indignation at the Koreans in Japan, not pleased with the ever-growing international authority of the DPRK. But this will make it harder for Japan to shake off an ill fame as a political dwarf but harden the will of the Korean people to settle accounts with Japan.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Japanese Rightwing Element's Hysteria
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Japanese Rightwing Element's Hysteria 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Ishihara, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, talked such rubbish on Saturday  as "stupid North Koreans set fire to Yasukuni Shrine."
					 This cannot but be a laughing stock of world people. 
					
					 As far as Ishihara is concerned, he claims to be a representative of the ultra-right forces of Japan. He is a hysteric cursed and censured by the public at home and abroad for letting loose torrents of incoherent remarks. 
					
					 It was this guy who was compelled to make an apology to the angry Japanese for describing the great quake which occurred in Japan a few years back as "a severe punishment." It was again this guy who was condemned by world people for painting 2008 Beijing Olympiad as "Berlin Olympiad in the era of Hitler."
					
					 What Ishihara uttered was so nonsensical that even a news service of Japan could not but deplore that he seemed to have misinterpreted the case that happened in December of 2011 in which a Chinese was suspected of setting fire to Yasukuni Shrine.
					
					 What matters is that his utterances could not be interpreted as ill-advised bravery to demonstrate his image.
					
					 Lurking behind his hysteric outbursts are his wrong understanding of history and his extreme national chauvinism.
					
					 Right-wing gangsters in various parts of Japan perpetrated shooting and arson sprees against institutions of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and organized terror against Korean students in Japan in October of 2003. They went the lengths of hatching even a plot to justify the armed crackdown upon Chongryon by designating it as a target of application of "the law on prevention of subversive activities." 
					
					 At a time when public inside and outside Japan became critical of it, Ishihara, governor of Tokyo Metropolis at that time, was shameless enough to justify "the 1910 Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty." He blustered that Japan did not invade Korea by force of arms but the Korean Peninsula was not stable because of division and, consequently, this required annexation to get help from Japanese with same race by the general will of the Koreans." 
					
					 Referring to the International League which was created in the 1920s, he talked such rubbish beyond common sense that "nobody slandered Japan though the International League existed at that time."
					
					 Recently, Ishihara, referring to the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, remarked in support of sophism let loose by Hashimoto, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, that "sexual slavery for the army was necessary at that time" only to become a target of domestic and foreign public criticism. 
					
					 This is inveterate outlook of the right-wing reactionaries of Japan including Ishihara on history and their invariable bitterness towards the DPRK. 
					
					 The hostile policy and moves of the Japanese reactionaries against the DPRK are based on lies and fabrications and aimed at realizing their wild ambition for reinvasion. 
					
					 They should bear in mind that their policy and scenario can never come true as they are based on national chauvinism and phobia about Koreans. 
					
					 The ultra-right forces of Japan, dregs of the times, had better quit the political arena along with Ishihara whose days are numbered. This would do either Asia or Japan good.
					
					 Should they stick to the anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK, oblivious of this, they will only precipitate their political doom.

articles.title: Japan Should Be Ashamed of Its Wrongs: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan Should Be Ashamed of Its Wrongs: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A group of oldest-ever prostitutes has been recently disclosed in Tokyo, stunning the world.
					 It cannot but be a shocking case as even old women were used for the business to gratify the sexual desire of young men in the heart of Tokyo, although Japan is well known to the world for prostitution.
					
					 63 year-old woman Kazuko Suwa openly admitted after being arrested by Tokyo Metropolitan Police Agency while operating a brothel that "she operated a club of old prostitutes to meet the high demand of old men".
					
					 She seemed to have nothing to be ashamed of as even the state politicians of Japan are openly justifying the sexual slavery enforced for the Japanese Imperial Army in the past.
					
					 Such political and moral vulgarity of Japan gets more pronounced than that at the outset of human civilization. This is totally attributable to the wrong way of thinking of the Japanese politicians.
					
					 It happened only recently that Hashimoto, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party and mayor of Osaka, let out sophism that sexual slavery enforced for the Imperial Japanese Army was necessary for bolstering up the combat capabilities of the soldiers under the situation that prevailed at that time.
					
					 Even a lady official of the Japanese government who should be infuriated more than any others by such remarks of despising women unblushingly justified the issue of sexual slavery, stunning world people.
					
					 The gravity of the issue is that such view is not the one of just a few right-wing politicians.
					
					 When the UN Anti-Torture Committee urged the Japanese government to retract Hashimoto's remarks over the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the latter adopted a reply letter which noted that "the remarks had no legal binding force" so that "the government is not obliged to follow the advice of the UN committee" at its ministerial meeting.
					
					 The Japanese chief cabinet secretary at a press conference held as regards the contents of the reply letter said "it is the view of the government that there will be no such remarks again." This implicitly supports and patronizes the reckless remarks of Hashimoto.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is the fact that even youngsters are embellishing the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity.
					
					 A Japanese female student once recklessly said that the women in Asia should deem it honor to have been sexual slaves of the soldiers of the Imperial Japanese Army. Her remarks help guess the picture of Japan totally corrupt in terms of politics and morality.
					
					 This is an outlook on history and ethics of the Japanese who are all rotten, irrespective of age or sex. And this is a serious matter which makes Japan's future gloomy.
					
					 However, Japan has neither made an apology nor reflected on its past thrice-cursed crimes against humanity but is very busy with a "human rights" campaign against other countries through its hectic diplomacy.
					
					 It is quite natural that such ridiculous behavior of the Japanese reactionaries has sparked off world-wide censure.
					
					 When the Japanese ambassador in charge of the issue of human rights and humanitarian affairs said "Japan is one of the countries which are highly developed in the field of human rights" at a session of the UN Anti-Torture Committee held in Geneva in May, all its participants burst into laughter.
					
					 Such incident something rare in the history of UN diplomacy was recorded as a special political cartoon and tragic story in diplomacy which shows how the international community looks at Japan.
					
					 Japan should feel ashamed of its doings after recollecting upon its past, though belatedly.
					
					 It should bear in mind that it will experience a hotter agony of shame if it keeps trumpeting about "human rights" in the international arena, not being aware of where it stands.

articles.title: European Parliament Delegation Here
articles.content:
European Parliament Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation for relations with the Korean Peninsula of the European Parliament arrived here Monday. It is led by Chairman Herbert REUL.

articles.content:
Advisor to Mongolian President Here
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Lundeg Purevsuren, national security and foreign policy advisor to the president of Mongolia, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.content:
Director General of Mongolian News Agency Montsame Here
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Avia Baatarhuyag, director general of the Mongolian News Agency Montsame arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize under Way
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize under Way
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize is at its height in the DPRK. The contest is to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					 An opening ceremony took place in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province on July 10.
					
					 The players compete in about 10 events including football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, boxing and weightlifting in Pyongyang, Hamhung and other places.

articles.title: Buckwheat Noodle, Good for Health in Hot Weather
articles.content:
Buckwheat Noodle Good for Health in Hot Weather
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Noodle made with buckwheat is one of main diets popular among Korean people in a spell of hot weather.
					 Containing carbohydrate and essential amino acid, buckwheat is highly resistant to heat.
					
					 It helps lower hypertension, remove inflammation of gum and prevent arteriosclerosis.
					
					 Pyongyang cold noodle, well known at home and abroad, is made with buckwheat as main raw materials.

articles.title: DPRK Directs Efforts to Protection of Marine Resources
articles.content:
DPRK Directs Efforts to Protection of Marine Resources
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- April and July are months for protection of marine resources in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the months, local fishing stations and fish farms pay particular attention to protecting and increasing marine resources.
					
					 Fishing stations in Wonsan and Thongchon have made big efforts to build habitats for various species of fish, including trepang, sea-ear and sea urchin.
					
					 The Hongwon Fishing Station built a marine resource reserve around the Juk Islet, while the Sonbong Fishing Station put tens of thousands of salmon fries in the stream of Josul Pass on the basis of analysis of its water quality.
					
					 The Pupho and Ongjin offshore farms have expanded tangle and laver culture grounds, while protecting seashell's habitats.
					
					 Fish farms across the country have installed various kinds of facilities in lakes and rivers to promote the growth of freshwater fish.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Leads Korean War to Victory (2)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Leads Korean War to Victory (2)
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953), President Kim Il Sung personally commanded the operation for the liberation of Taejon City.
					 In order to siege the city, he gave units of the Korean People's Army an order to cross the Kum River to break through the defence line built along the riverside.
					
					 Amassed in the city were the U.S. 24th Infantry Division and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. attempted to reinforce the defence of the city with its 1st Cavalry Division and the 25th Infantry Division landed on Phohang and Pusan.
					
					 One day in July Juche 39 (1950), Kim Il Sung convened an operational meeting at the Front Command and organized encirclement of the city.
					
					 The KPA units walked 40 kilometers overnight to completely siege the city, closing all roads to the city.
					
					 Early on the morning of July 20, they began offensive all at once under the aegis of artillery fire, fighting street battles to seize the city.
					
					 In the battles, the commander of the U.S. 24th Infantry Division was captured by a KPA soldier while making his escape in a soldier's uniform.
					
					 The operation gave a glimpse of the unique tactics employed by Kim Il Sung in the war.

articles.title: Large Candlelight Action Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Large Candlelight Action Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A large-scale candlelight action took place at Seoul Square on Saturday to denounce the illegal acts of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS). It was sponsored by the "Emergency Situation Council for Condemning IS's Interference in the Politically-motivated Presidential Election" of south Korea made up of more than 200 civic and public organizations.
					 Attending it were 23,000 persons, including members of civic and public organizations, citizens and lawmakers of opposition parties.
					
					 At the rally speakers accused the IS of continuing to interfere in politics by justifying its opening to public of the minutes of the south-north summit despite public condemnation.
					
					 They condemned the IS for interfering in the election, putting pressure on the courts and prosecution's investigation and conducting surveillance of politicians, unionists, civic and public organizations, etc. over the past five years.
					
					 If the case of the IS's interference in the election is not settled, the law will be meaningless in south Korea, in fact, they charged.
					
					 They demanded an immediate resignation of the director of the IS and a prompt state investigation into the IS.

articles.title: Disbandment of IS Called for
articles.content:
Disbandment of IS Called for
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- As known, the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) was hell-bent on building up public opinion and staging smear campaign during the last "presidential elections" by putting in motion psychological warfare agents for the extension of the then conservative regime. When the disclosure of this fact touched off ruling crisis, it made public the minutes of the north-south summit to divert the public attention to the issue of the "northern limit line".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary brands the IS's act of interfering in the "presidential elections" and making public the minutes as illegal politically-motivated hooliganism and an act violating democracy.
					
					 The IS has been engaged in deceiving the public and causing political turmoil in alignment with the conservative ruling forces to serve its sordid political purposes, the paper says, stressing that this vicious challenge to democracy of south Korean society can never be tolerated.
					
					 It will not be possible to check the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship nor to achieve national reconciliation and unity as long as IS is allowed to lord it over playing the role of a bridesmaid of the dictatorial ruler, the paper notes, adding:
					
					 It is the requirement of the times and unanimous will of the south Koreans to have the IS disbanded.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are trumpeting about the "reform of the IS" but this is just a deception to calm down the angered public and cover up the truth of the cases.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces can never shirk off the responsibility no matter what a sleight of hand it may employ as it is a chief accomplice directly related to the IS's interference in "presidential elections" and the minutes case.
					
					 No one can check the righteous struggle of south Koreans to have the den of plot-breeding disbanded and bring about the bright morning of independent reunification to democratized society.

articles.title: Enlarged Session of Plenary Meeting of DPRK Cabinet Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Session of Plenary Meeting of DPRK Cabinet Held
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- An enlarged session of the plenary meeting of the DPRK Cabinet was held recently.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju and members of the Cabinet.
					
					 Present as observers were leading officials of the institutions under the Cabinet, directors of management bureaus, chairmen of provincial, city and county people's committees, provincial rural economy committees and provincial regional planning committees, directors of provincial management bureaus of food and consumer goods industries and directors of major industrial establishments.
					
					 The session first discussed the issue of carrying out the important tasks set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in a historic appeal "Let Us Usher in a Fresh Heyday on All the Fronts of Socialist Construction by Creating the 'Speed on Masik Pass'". Then it reviewed the fulfillment of the national economic plan for the first half of the year and discussed the measures to successfully carry out the national economic plan for the third quarter of the year.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju made a report on the first issue and Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol a report on the second issue.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said soldier-builders on Masik Pass are pushing forward several projects in a three dimensional way and breaking levels and records set in the past amid a high-pitched drive for creating the "speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 Reclaimers of the Sepho tableland made shining achievements with the goal to reclaim more than 50 000 hectares of grassland and finish the construction of stock-breeding management center within this year, they noted. Fresh successes and innovations are being made in the construction of major projects including the construction of the Chongchongang Power Stations in Tiers and apartment houses for scientists.
					
					 They said unprecedented production swing is being effected in the different sectors of the national economy amid the efforts to carry out the tasks advanced by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and appeal.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are faced with the heavy yet responsible tasks to usher in a new heyday on all fronts of socialist construction by working hard to create the "speed on Masik Pass" in hearty response to the historic appeal made by the Marshal while carrying through the tasks laid out in his New Year Address, they said, advanced tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 The meeting adopted a relevant decision.

articles.title: South Korean Prosecution Denounced for Unethical Action
articles.content:
South Korean Prosecution Denounced for Unethical Action 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a commentary in denunciation of the puppet prosecution's unethical action on July 12.
					 The commentary accused the prosecution of mulling putting in custody the assistant secretary general of the organization just three days later though he had been released on July 9 for the suspension of the execution of the detention due to the death of his mother.
					
					 Far from expressing sympathy and condolence to the bereaved family, the prosecution committed such rash action to touch off irrepressible resentment at it, the commentary charged, and went on:
					
					 What the members of the organization have done can never be incriminated. We can never tolerate the moves of the regime and the anti-reunification conservative forces to detain them and use them for meeting their sinister political purpose.
					
					  The commentary urged the authorities to unconditionally release the illegally detained members of the organization.
					
					 The organization will carry on its actions against the anti-reunification acts of the conservative forces pursuing confrontation with compatriots in violation of the north-south joint declaration, the commentary concluded.

articles.title: Punishing Lee Myung Bak Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishing Lee Myung Bak Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The All-people Measure Committee for Restoring Four Large Rivers of south Korea, which consists of environmental, civic and public bodies, held a press conference outside the house of traitor Lee Myung Bak in Ronhyon-dong, Seoul on July 11 in denunciation of his fraud and  swindling.
					 Referring to the disclosure of the results of investigation made by the Board of Audit and Inspection that the project for improving four large rivers started with the purpose of building a big canal from the outset, the body said the project proved to be a fraud aimed to deceive the people.
					
					 The promise made by Lee not to go ahead with the canal project was a whopping lie, the body said, adding that he must be severely punished.
					
					 Noting that "government" institutions belatedly admitted the assertions made by experts and various organizations from long ago, the body said that if the Board of Audit and Inspection had conducted proper investigation into the issue, the four large rivers would not have been caught in such a predicament.
					
					 It said that Lee and the former regime must be held responsible for the situation from legal and political aspects.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Poland, Romania, Iceland and Malaysia in the period between July 5 and 7 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were figures of various circles and masses in the relevant countries.
					
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, praised Kim Il Sung as a distinguished leader possessed of all qualities as a statesman.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung recalled all the former university students from the front to pursue their study during the past Korean war, a clear proof of his far-sighted wisdom and the personality as a great man who made sure that all work was oriented to future.
					
					 The chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army noted that the greatest exploits performed by Kim Il Sung was that he successfully solved the issue of his successor.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK has successfully carried forward the strategy and line set forth by Kim Il Sung despite the old generation is replaced by the young. As a result, the DPRK emerged a nuclear weapons state in the world.
					
					 The DPRK showed in practice that if it is to protect its ideology and dignity, it should have powerful military muscle without fail. 
					
					 The moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK are meeting only repeated setbacks in face of the DPRK strong in independence.
					
					 The just cause of the Korean people is sure to win as they are led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said that Kim Il Sung was a great revolutionary who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country, national reunification and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence, adding that he always lives in the hearts of the progressive people.
					
					 The manager of a Malaysian company praised Kim Il Sung for his popular character, saying that he was the tender-hearted father of the Korean people as he dedicated his all to the people, believing in them as in Heaven.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Poland.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Italy, Pakistan and Malaysia on July 5 and 8 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were personages of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, Communist Party of Italy, Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, Pakistan Awami National Party, Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, Karachi Juche Study Center of Pakistan and a Malaysian company and other masses.
					
					 The director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great thinker and theoretician who founded the Juche idea and great master of leadership.
					
					 The victory in the Korean war and the socialist state in Korea would have been unthinkable without his leadership.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the idea and the cause of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending the socialist cause and sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan lauded the peerlessly great man for dedicating his whole life to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The manager of the Malaysian company said that the whole life of Kim Il Sung was devoted to the people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung who embarked on the road of revolution in his teens turned the DPRK into a socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and made the Korean people the most dignified and happiest people in the world.
					
					 He founded the immortal Juche idea, hewed out the cause of the Songun revolution and defended socialist Korea.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Patriot in its No. 25 carried an article titled "Immortal are the cause and idea of the great men who enjoy an everlasting life" illustrated with photos of Kim Il Sung dealing with his exploits.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung is respected not only by the Korean people but also by progressive mankind as he was the leader of the popular masses who regarded the liberation of the country and its people from exploitation and oppression as the objective of his life and set the prosperity and well-being of the nation as a state policy.
					
					 The feats performed by him for humankind are widely known to the world.
					
					 Politicians in many countries are still releasing articles on him to praise his rare leadership art and noble virtues.
					
					 All people were fascinated by his sun-like bright smile, rare wisdom and far-sighted insight.
					
					 His greatness was recognized by famous state activists and figures in various circles in the East and West.
					
					 The July 10th issue of Rio Panorama carried an article titled "Life dedicated to the people" accompanied by a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The article referred to the fact that he believed in people as in Heaven all his life, stressing that his noble personality would be enshrined by the Korean people and the world progressives as the image of a tender-hearted father and great leader.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a acoger con grandes exitos el 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a acoger con grandes exitos el 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra
 Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este lunes el editorial que exhorta a todos a avanzar con pasos firmes hacia el 27 de julio de victoria exaltando el impetu de innovacion y avance continuos bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aspiran unanimes a crear meritos heroicos en el enfrentamiento antiyanqui y la construccion de Estado prospero bajo la sabia direccion del partido y hacer brillar el 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria como gran festival de triunfadores, comienza el editorial y continua:
					
					 Celebrar con solemnidad esa efemeride es asunto importante para defender con firmeza y glorificar ante el mundo la hazana inmortal del Presidente hecha por el triunfo de guerra.
					
					 El realizo esa proeza ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la humanidad al derrotar al imperialismo yanqui que se jactaba de la "supremacia" mundial.
					
					 Sin ella, no pueden imaginar en la gran dignidad y aspecto invencible de la RPDC ni en la vida valiosa y futuro radiante del pueblo coreano.
					
					 Para nuestro pueblo que vive y lucha en la patria socialista del Juche defendida por el Presidente, resultan obligacion sagrada defender y glorificar su hazana por la victoria en guerra.
					
					 A medida que se acerca el 27 de julio, en todos los lugares desde Pyongyang hasta el puesto de islote solitario se expresa el fuerte sentimiento de agradecimiento a los grandes Generalisimos y se desarrollan con dinamismo los trabajos para hacer brillar la proeza referida del Presidente.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC celebraran con solemnidad el dia de victoria en guerra para infundir fe y optimismo en los paises y pueblos aspirantes a la independencia y dar golpe duro a los imperialistas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun insiste en eliminar estado de enfrentamiento Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun insiste en eliminar estado de enfrentamiento Norte-Sur
 Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado el dia 15, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que eliminar el estado de enfrentamiento entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea es un problema imprescindible para lograr cuanto antes la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria.
					 Bajo tal situacion, no se puede crear un ambiente favorable a la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, senala y continua:
					
					 No hay ninguna razon que impida acabar con el estado de enfrentamiento. La diferencia de ideas y regimenes existentes en ambas partes coreanas durante largo tiempo no puede ser motivo de antipatia y confrontacion entre los connacionales. La confrontacion fratricida tendra la guerra como desenlace. Los ejercicios militares de diversos tipos que desarrollan sin parar las autoridades surcoreanas junto con Estados Unidos son el crimen que agudiza mas el enfrenamiento politico y militar entre los connacionales y viola la paz de la Peninsula Coreana. Los ejercicios belicos constituyen una abierta amenaza a la contraparte. Mientras exista tal amenaza, no se puede pensar en la paz y se agrandara solo la desconfianza entre los compatriotas.
					
					 La reunificacion de la patria es posible con la gran unidad nacional. Nuestra nacion es la homogenea que tiene larga historia y cultura de cinco mil anos. Aunque fue dividida en dos por las fuerzas foraneas, ella puede lograr la unidad basandose en la comunidad de la nacion. Si uno trata de imponer a otro su regimen insistiendo en la diferencia de ideas y regimenes, no se puede evitar la confrontacion ni la guerra.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas suelen hablar de la "confianza", pero, no toman parte activa en el dialogo y la cooperacion. Y hablan de "nuevas relaciones S-N" desalentando nuestros esfuerzos sinceros.
					
					 Si ellas quieren seguir enfrentandose con los compatriotas desoyendo la demanda de la nacion, las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas no se mejoraran nunca.
					
					 Todos los coreanos en el interior y exterior deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha patriotica por eliminar el estado conflictivo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y abrir el amplio sendero hacia la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
